categories: Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Kotiate was an Imperial Star Destroyer during the Galactic Civil War.

During one supply run, the Rebels attacked with a strike force consisting of X-wings, B-wings, and A-wings. With his ship's systems failing, the captain of the Star Destroyer tried to retreat in a shuttle, but it was also destroyed. The Bird of Prey arrived along with TIE Avengers in a last desperate attempt to save the Star Destroyer, but they were too late, and the Kotiate was destroyed by the Rebel forces.
